name: Elysium Ascension
description:
This quick blocking project was created on Unreal Engine 5 using a parkour template, for a level design course. The goal of this game is to reach the top of the tower, using the various parkour tools at your disposition : double jumps, sliding, wall run, climbing...

The game includes a playable tutorial, and is composed of one unique level, that is about 5 minutes long.
